intro: A universe of adventures at your fingertips
description:
Servers on the Nintendo platform will be shut down on October 29, 2025.
For more details, please visit our Forum: https://eu.4gameforum.com/threads/695514/

DISCOVER AELION
Skyforge is an online action game inspired by science-fiction and fantasy, set in a breathtaking universe rife with gods and monsters. As an Immortal of Aelion, team up with players around the world to uncover amazing stories, explore lands uncharted, and defend a massive, constantly evolving world from invasion!

PLAY WHEREVER, WHENEVER
Take your intergalactic adventures on the move! Session-based gameplay makes it easy to play while traveling, on your lunch break, or kicking back at home. Pick up and play anytime, anywhere: Aelion will be waiting for you!

DYNAMIC COMBAT OPTIMIZED FOR NINTENDO SWITCH™
Awaken your Immortal powers in TV, tabletop, or handheld mode! Use Joy-Con™ controllers or the Nintendo Switch™ Pro Controller to master an intuitive combat system, and powerful attacks unique to each class. Unlock Divine Forms to unleash your true fighting potential!

INSTANTLY SWITCH BETWEEN 19 CLASSES
Immortals wield incredible magic and unique abilities, and you can switch between 19 unlockable classes to experience it to the fullest. Rock out with the Soundweaver's killer riffs, harness the power of nature with the Grovewalker, or set Aelion ablaze with the Firestarter!

A WORLD UNDER ATTACK
Invasions are limited-time seasonal events that will truly test your skill. As creatures from the deepest trenches, invaders from beyond the stars, and evil avatars of destruction descend on Aelion, stand and fight! Get the Invasion Pass to earn special rewards, including exclusive in-game cosmetics.

PLAY FOR FREE
Skyforge is free to download and play and receives regular, free content updates, so you can adventure without limits 24/7!

Headstart Access is available for Skyforge! Founder's Pack Bundles (Starter, Deluxe or Ultimate) also contain a 2-day Headstart, active from 02/02/2021 at 06:00 PST.
